This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A black slow moving craft flew above my house.
divs: sighting detailssaturday 3\8\2008 around 7pm. cool dry air and dusk with plenty of light.i was walking to my truck and saw a black triangle in the air. at first i thought it was this really cool looking kite or maybe a ballon. it slowly flew over my neighbors house then over my street. it was traveling slowly and was about the size of a small car. it was solid black but the bottom of this craft was iridescence golden black. it moved slowly about 15 - 20 mph and in a straight line with no sound. its altitude was approx. 100 ft and it never varied. its wings were drifting from left to right. i ran inside and grabbed my son. he saw it as it flew over the back yard. i got into my truck and tried to follow it but i did not see it when i pulled onto the main street . there have been multiple sitings in stevensville, corpus christi and san antonio since january 08. i found some pictures online of extactly what i saw. the drawing is mine but the pictures are from http:\\www.ufocasebook.com\2009\sc031609.html
